laboratory_examinations.findings: 1.4 mmol per liter (normal value, <2.1 mmol per liter)

Hemoglobin level was 13.0 g per deciliter; white-cell count of 8900 per cubic millimeter, with 44% neutrophils, 21% bands, and 1246 (14%) eosinophils per cubic millimeter; platelet count of 133,000 per cubic millimeter.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Hemoglobin decreased from 14.4 g per deciliter to 13.0 g per deciliter. Eosinophils increased from 459 (5.1%) per cubic millimeter to 1246 (14%) per cubic millimeter.
Decreased to 1.32 ng per milliliter on days 2 and 3 after admission.
Decreased from 2.02 ng per milliliter at admission to <0.10 ng per milliliter 1 week after discharge.
Increased from 1.4 mmol per liter at admission to 2.64 mmol per liter 1 week after discharge.
